Top-3 Similar Questions: so_29310990: Compare two dates in shell script
Top-3 Scripts:
so_29310990: d1="2015-03-31" d2="2015-04-01"
if [ "$d1" = "$d2" ]; then
    echo "same day"
elif expr "$d1" "<" "$d2" >/dev/null; then
    echo "d1 is earlier than d2"
else
    echo "d1 is later than d2"
fi
